    • Field Detail

      • ANIMATION_IN_RENDERER_ALLOWED

        public static final Key<java.lang.Boolean> ANIMATION_IN_RENDERER_ALLOWED
        This key is used to allow animated icons in lists, tables and trees. If the corresponding client property is set to true the corresponding component will be automatically repainted to update an animated icon painted by the renderer of the component. Note, that animation may cause a performance problems and should not be used everywhere.
        See Also:
        UIUtil.putClientProperty(javax.swing.JComponent, com.intellij.openapi.util.Key<T>, T)
